channel.title: Java Error
channel.description:
I get this Error when I go to run MoparScape (With jdk1.5.0_09 on Linux 2.6.16-gentoo-r12.):
[code]colin@phoenix ~/rs $ ./runMoparScape-linux.sh Exception in thread "main" java.awt.HeadlessException: No X11 DISPLAY variable was set, but this program performed an operation which requires it. at java.applet.Applet.<init>(Applet.java:44) at Applet_Sub1.<init>(Applet_Sub1.java:452) at client.<init>(client.java:10798) at Bot.<init>(Bot.java:148) at Bot.main(Bot.java:118) colin@phoenix ~/rs $ [/code]

item.title: Java Error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

555wetip1:

what source u use that doesn’t have client.java and yues i can help u toosaurumon2

He is using Moparscape… Not a source.
